trans-unit.source: The buffer to write data from.
trans-unit.target: The buffer to write data from.

trans-unit.source: The zero-based byte offset in buffer at which to begin copying bytes to the current stream.
trans-unit.target: The zero-based byte offset in buffer at which to begin copying bytes to the current stream.

trans-unit.source: The number of bytes to write.
trans-unit.target: The number of bytes to write.

trans-unit.source: An optional asynchronous callback, to be called when the write is complete.
trans-unit.target: An optional asynchronous callback, to be called when the write is complete.

trans-unit.source: A user-provided object that distinguishes this particular asynchronous write request from other requests.
trans-unit.target: A user-provided object that distinguishes this particular asynchronous write request from other requests.

trans-unit.source: An IAsyncResult that represents the asynchronous write, which could still be pending.
trans-unit.target: An IAsyncResult that represents the asynchronous write, which could still be pending.
